attributes.action: Capt. Tom should be promoted to Major Tom.
attributes.additional_details: This Country needs recognise Capt. Tom Moore for his selfless achievement for the country.
attributes.background: Capt. Tom Moore is and inspiration a true Gent. who has done his bit for Queen and country.  Then at the age of 99 comes out of retirement to do his 'bit' again.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
